00071 #define CVMX_DFA_ITYPE_MEMLOAD      0x0
00072 #define CVMX_DFA_ITYPE_CACHELOAD    0x1
00073 #define CVMX_DFA_ITYPE_GRAPHFREE    0x3
00074 #define CVMX_DFA_ITYPE_GRAPHWALK    0x4
00075 
00076 typedef union {
00077     uint64_t u64;
00078     struct {
00079 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00080         uint64_t size:24;
00081         uint64_t addr:40;
00082 #else
00083         uint64_t addr:40;
00084         uint64_t size:24;
00085 #endif
00086     } s;
00087 } cvmx_dfa_gather_entry_t;

00089 typedef union {
00090     struct {
00091 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00092         uint64_t f1:3;
00093         uint64_t unused1:2;
00094         uint64_t snode:27;
00095         uint64_t gather_mode:1;
00096         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00097         uint64_t store_full:1;

00099         uint64_t small:1;
00100         uint64_t itype:3;
00101         uint64_t unused0:2;
00102         uint64_t mbase:22;
00103 #else
00104         uint64_t mbase:22;
00105         uint64_t unused0:2;
00106         uint64_t itype:3;
00107         uint64_t small:1;
00108         uint64_t load_through:1;
00109         uint64_t store_full:1;
00110         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00111         uint64_t gather_mode:1;
00112         uint64_t snode:27;
00113         uint64_t unused1:2;
00114         uint64_t f1:3;
00115 #endif
00116     } walk;
00117     struct {
00118 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00119         uint64_t unused4:7;
00120         uint64_t dbase:9;
00121         uint64_t unused3:2;
00122         uint64_t cbase:14;
00123         uint64_t gather_mode:1;
00124         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00125         uint64_t store_full:1;
00126         uint64_t load_through:1;
00127         uint64_t unused2:1;
00128         uint64_t itype:3;
00129         uint64_t unused1:6;
00130         uint64_t dsize:10;
00131         uint64_t unused0:2;
00132         uint64_t pgid:6;
00133 #else
00134         uint64_t pgid:6;
00135         uint64_t unused0:2;
00136         uint64_t dsize:10;
00137         uint64_t unused1:6;
00138         uint64_t itype:3;

00145         uint64_t unused3:2;
00146         uint64_t dbase:9;
00147         uint64_t unused4:7;
00148 #endif
00149     } cload;
00150     struct {
00151 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00152         uint64_t unused2:32;
00153         uint64_t gather_mode:1;
00154         uint64_t little_endian:1;
00155         uint64_t store_full:1;
00156         uint64_t load_through:1;
00157         uint64_t unused1:1;

00172     } mload;
00173     struct {
00174 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00175         uint64_t unused2:34;
00176         uint64_t store_full:1;
00177         uint64_t unused1:2;
00178         uint64_t itype:3;
00179         uint64_t unused0:24;
00180 #else

00182         uint64_t itype:3;
00183         uint64_t unused1:2;
00184         uint64_t store_full:1;
00185         uint64_t unused2:34;
00186 #endif
00187     } free;
00188 } cvmx_dfa_word0_t;

00190 typedef union {
00191     struct {
00192 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00193         uint64_t rmax:16;
00194         uint64_t f2:8;
00195         uint64_t rptr:40;
00196 #else
00197         uint64_t rptr:40;
00198         uint64_t f2:8;
00199         uint64_t rmax:16;
00200 #endif
00201     } walk;
00202     struct {
00203 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00204         uint64_t unused1:13;
00205         uint64_t rmax:3;
00206         uint64_t unused0:8;
00207         uint64_t rptr:40;
00208 #else
00209         uint64_t rptr:40;
00210         uint64_t unused0:8;
00211         uint64_t rmax:3;
00212         uint64_t unused1:13;
00213 #endif
00214     } cload;
00215     struct {
00216 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00217         uint64_t unused1:4;
00218         uint64_t rmax:12;
00219         uint64_t unused0:8;
00220         uint64_t rptr:40;
00221 #else
00222         uint64_t rptr:40;
00223         uint64_t unused0:8;
00224         uint64_t rmax:12;
00225         uint64_t unused1:4;
00226 #endif
00227     } mload;
00228     struct {
00229 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00230         uint64_t unused:24;
00231         uint64_t rptr:40;
00232 #else
00233         uint64_t rptr:40;
00234         uint64_t unused:24;
00235 #endif
00236     } free;
00237 } cvmx_dfa_word1_t;
00238 
00239 typedef union {
00240     struct {
00241 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00242         uint64_t dlen:16;
00243         uint64_t srepl:2;
00244         uint64_t unused:2;
00245         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00246         uint64_t dptr:40;
00247 #else
00248         uint64_t dptr:40;
00249         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00250         uint64_t unused:2;
00251         uint64_t srepl:2;
00252         uint64_t dlen:16;
00253 #endif
00254     } walk;
00255     struct {
00256 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00257         uint64_t dlen:16;
00258         uint64_t unused:4;
00259         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00260         uint64_t dptr:40;
00261 #else
00262         uint64_t dptr:40;
00263         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00264         uint64_t unused:4;
00265         uint64_t dlen:16;
00266 #endif
00267     } cload;
00268     struct {
00269 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00270         uint64_t dlen:16;
00271         uint64_t repl:2;
00272         uint64_t unused:2;
00273         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00274         uint64_t dptr:40;
00275 #else
00276         uint64_t dptr:40;
00277         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00278         uint64_t unused:2;
00279         uint64_t repl:2;
00280         uint64_t dlen:16;
00281 #endif
00282     } mload;
00283     struct {
00284 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00285         uint64_t unused1:20;
00286         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00287         uint64_t unused0:40;
00288 #else
00289         uint64_t unused0:40;
00290         uint64_t clmsk:4;
00291         uint64_t unused1:20;
00292 #endif
00293     } free;
00294 } cvmx_dfa_word2_t;
00295 
00296 typedef union {
00297     struct {
00298 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00299         uint64_t unused1:2;
00300         uint64_t vgid:8;
00301         uint64_t unused0:5;
00302         uint64_t f3:9;
00303         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00304 #else
00305         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00306         uint64_t f3:9;
00307         uint64_t unused0:5;
00308         uint64_t vgid:8;
00309         uint64_t unused1:2;
00310 #endif
00311     } walk;
00312     struct {
00313 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00314         uint64_t unused1:2;
00315         uint64_t vgid:8;
00316         uint64_t unused0:7;
00317         uint64_t f4:7;
00318         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00319 #else
00320         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00321         uint64_t f4:7;
00322         uint64_t unused0:7;
00323         uint64_t vgid:8;
00324         uint64_t unused1:2;
00325 #endif
00326     } cload;
00327     struct {
00328 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00329         uint64_t unused1:2;
00330         uint64_t vgid:8;
00331         uint64_t unused0:7;
00332         uint64_t f4:7;
00333         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00334 #else
00335         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00336         uint64_t f4:7;
00337         uint64_t unused0:7;
00338         uint64_t vgid:8;
00339         uint64_t unused1:2;
00340 #endif
00341     } mload;
00342     struct {
00343 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00344         uint64_t unused1:2;
00345         uint64_t vgid:8;
00346         uint64_t unused0:14;
00347         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00348 #else
00349         uint64_t wqptr:40;
00350         uint64_t unused0:14;
00351         uint64_t vgid:8;
00352         uint64_t unused1:2;
00353 #endif
00354     } free;
00355 } cvmx_dfa_word3_t;
00356 
00357 typedef union {
00358     uint64_t u64[4];
00359     struct {
00360         cvmx_dfa_word0_t word0;
00361         cvmx_dfa_word1_t word1;
00362         cvmx_dfa_word2_t word2;
00363         cvmx_dfa_word3_t word3;
00364     };
00365 } cvmx_dfa_command_t;
00366 
00367 typedef struct
00368 {
00369     cvmx_fpa_pool_config_t dfa_pool;
00370 }cvmx_dfa_app_config_t;
00371 
00372 extern CVMX_SHARED cvmx_dfa_app_config_t dfa_config;
00373 
00374 static inline int64_t cvmx_fpa_get_dfa_pool(void)
00375 {
00376     return (dfa_config.dfa_pool.pool_num);  
00377 } 
00378 
00379 static inline uint64_t cvmx_fpa_get_dfa_pool_block_size(void)
00380 {
00381     return (dfa_config.dfa_pool.buffer_size);   
00382 }

00384 
00385 #ifdef CVMX_ENABLE_DFA_FUNCTIONS
00386 /**
00387  * Initialize the DFA hardware before use
00388  * Returns 0 on success, -1 on failure
00389  */
00390 int cvmx_hfa_initialize(void);
00391 
00392 /**
00393  * Shutdown and cleanup resources used by the DFA
00394  */
00395 int cvmx_hfa_shutdown(void);
00396 
00397 /**
00398  * Submit a command to the HFA block
00399  *
00400  * @param command HFA command to submit
00401  *
00402  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00403  */
00404 int cvmx_hfa_submit(cvmx_dfa_command_t * command);
00405 
00406 /**
00407  * Allocate a block of memory from the free list that was passed
00408  * to the application by the bootloader.
00409  * 
00410  * @param size      Size in bytes of block to allocate
00411  * @param alignment Alignment required - must be power of 2
00412  *
00413  *  @return pointer to block of memory, NULL on error 
00414  */
00415 
00416 void *hfa_bootmem_alloc(uint64_t size, uint64_t alignment);
00417 
00418 /**
00419  * Frees a block to the bootmem allocator list.  
00420  *
00421  * @param ptr      address of block  (memory pointer (void*))
00422  * @param size     size of block in bytes.
00423  *
00424  * @return 1 on success,
00425  *         0 on failure
00426  *
00427  */
00428 
00429 int hfa_bootmem_free(void *ptr, uint64_t size);
00430 
00431 #endif
